summary: Elizabeth, a vet assistant, falls for Max, who brings in an abused dog. His jealousy burdens their relationship as does talk of marriage. Lena wants Max and she schemes.
cast: Drew Barrymore|Jennifer Beals|Desiree Casado|Isabel Gillies|Mel Gorham|James Le Gros|Joseph Mosso|Lázaro Pérez|Frank Senger|Jon Stewart|Eric Thal|Jennifer Lila|Andy Marks|Robert Sean Miller|Andy Redmond
title: Piensa en mí
